org.fujion.highcharts

Class DialOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.highcharts.DialOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter

    public class DialOptions
extends Options
    Options for a gauge dial.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String backgroundColor
      The background or fill color of the gauge's dial.
      String baseLength
      The length of the dial's base part, relative to the total radius or length of the dial.
      Integer baseWidth
      The pixel width of the base of the gauge dial.
      String borderColor
      The border color or stroke of the gauge's dial.
      Integer borderWidth
      The width of the gauge dial border in pixels.
      String radius
      The radius or length of the dial, in percentages relative to the radius of the gauge itself.
      String rearLength
      The length of the dial's rear end, the part that extends out on the other side of the pivot.
      String topWidth
      The width of the top of the dial, closest to the perimeter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DialOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class org.fujion.ancillary.Options

        copyTo, toMap

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • backgroundColor

        public String backgroundColor
        The background or fill color of the gauge's dial. Defaults to black.

      • baseLength

        public String baseLength
        The length of the dial's base part, relative to the total radius or length of the dial. Defaults to 70%.

      • baseWidth

        public Integer baseWidth
        The pixel width of the base of the gauge dial. The base is the part closest to the pivot, defined by baseLength. Defaults to 3.

      • borderColor

        public String borderColor
        The border color or stroke of the gauge's dial. By default, the borderWidth is 0, so this must be set in addition to a custom border color. Defaults to silver.

      • borderWidth

        public Integer borderWidth
        The width of the gauge dial border in pixels. Defaults to 0.

      • radius

        public String radius
        The radius or length of the dial, in percentages relative to the radius of the gauge itself. Defaults to 80%.

      • rearLength

        public String rearLength
        The length of the dial's rear end, the part that extends out on the other side of the pivot. Relative to the dial's length. Defaults to 10%.

      • topWidth

        public String topWidth
        The width of the top of the dial, closest to the perimeter. The pivot narrows in from the base to the top. Defaults to 1.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DialOptions

        public DialOptions()
